name: The Serpent (SirTartarus)
description:
The Serpent is a game based on 1976´s Snake game.

Break the apples before the snake does and get the weapon inside for an opportunity to hurt the snake. But beware! When the snake realises you have stolen it´s food, it will now head towards you!

You have the advantage of having a map and your ears to guide you through the reptile´s maze, but that does not mean the snake is blind. Infact, it will choose the shortest path to whichever it´s objective is. If you are being chased... go for the corners!

--------------------- CONTROLS---------------------

W, A, S and D to move.

Left click to shoot (Only when the minigun is at hand!).

E to break the apples.

Look down to see the map.

Kill the snake to win the game!
